title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons in the dialog are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The spacing between the button and the list is too large; the top button should be aligned with the dialog top. b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. c. Multiple selections should be allowed, as 'move up / down' can be applied to more than one item. d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. e. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: a. Click to open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog. b. Observe the small size of the buttons and the lack of a selected table entry. c. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe the cutoff in the preview. d. Open the dialog for a method with many parameters and observe the oversized dialog. e. Attempt to perform multiple selections and apply 'move up / down' actions. f. Verify the alignment of the top button with the dialog top. g. Check if the table has a label containing a mnemonic. h. Verify the wrapping of the signature preview label and the background color during hover.
